summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1890, for the improvement of Eighteenth Avenue Northeast and Nineteenth Avenue Northeast, each from East Sixty-fifth Street to East Seventy-third Street, by constructing an eight-inch water main therein; and East Seventy-third Street, from Eighteenth Avenue Northeast to Nineteenth Avenue Northeast, by constructing a two inch water main therein, under Ordinance No.19558, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
